participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and humorous, loves to have fun and enjoys the company of friends.
participant_1.background: I just want to have fun with my friends. I work part-time at Burger King. I am 19 and cannot wait to move out of my parents' home. They are constantly on my back. I do not drink or do drugs or anything.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Caring and responsible, balances work and home life while enjoying simple pleasures.
participant_2.background: I've one brother. I live in Alabama. I love dogs. I've three sisters. I like tacos.
